page.title: 07Bramhope: Religions
page.content: There are 3 churches in Bramhope,the Puritan Chapel,St. Giles Church and the Methodist Church.The Puritan Chapel is used twice a year by the whole village for a Carol Service at Christmas and for a Civic Service.Both St. Giles and the Methodist Church have seating capacities of approximately 200.Each Sunday an average of 250 people attend the services at church,with capacity attendances on special occasions.Both churches hold united services at monthly church parades,Harvest Festivals and a procession of Witness on Good Friday.There are numerous religous and social activities at each church which are well attended by cross sections of the community.Each church is controlled by a church council.Both churches have recently been renovated.
